translation.begin_msg: To start using Adno, please enter the URL of an IIIF manifest or an IIIF image a static picture in jpg or png format, or an Adno project

import.adno_project: Adno project found, would you like to import it ?

projects.nothing: Nothing to show, create your first project to start using Adno

project.no_desc: No description available for this project
project.title: Title
project.author: Author
project.add_desc: Add a little text to describe your project (optional)
project.add_title: Add a title to your project
project.choose_desc: Choose the image you want to use for your project
project.choose_canva: Use this picture for my project
project.back_home: Cancel and go back to homepage

metadatas_plh.title: Give a title to your project
metadatas_plh.description: Add a little text about your artwork
metadatas_plh.author: Add the author of the artwork here
metadatas_plh.editor: Add the editor of the artwork here
metadatas_plh.allocation_rights: Fill in here the rights of the artwork

settings.outline_focus: Color of annotation outline with focus
settings.fullscreen: Show toolbar in full screen mode
settings.annos_nav: Show list of annotations in sidebar
settings.begin_first_anno: Always start autoplay at first annotation
settings.should_auto_play_annotations: Starts annotation playback automatically when the presentation is loaded
settings.tags: Only annotations including at least one of this tag will be displayed
settings.show_only_current_annotation: Show only the outlines of the current annotation
settings.spatialization: The audio annotations will be played together with a spatialization effect
settings.no_spatialization: Audio annotations will be played individually
settings.annotation_sound: Choose a mode for audio annotations

visualizer.help_key_arrows: arrows (left and right) to change the current selected annotation.
visualizer.help_doc: For more information, please consult the official documentation of Adno

modal.delete_project: Would you really want to delete this project ?
modal.duplicate_project: Would you really want to duplicate this project ?
modal.ask_delete: Would you really like to delete this annotation ?
modal.project_edit_success: Your project have been updated successfully !
modal.adno_proj_detected: Adno project detected, would you like to import it ?
modal.old_version: One or more projects were made with an obsolete version of Adno
modal.update_old_version: Update to the latest version of Adno
modal.version_updated: Congratulations, your Adno projects are now up to date

annotation.empty_tags_list: The created tags will be displayed here.

navbar.share_project_desc1: First, download your project file. To share it, you can either send it by e-mail, or place it online - on a website, a file server or on the IPFS interplanetary file system - and then share its URL or IPFS CID.
navbar.share_project_desc2: Once your Adno project is online, you can make it visible on a web page by inserting an iframe tag.
navbar.share_project_desc3: For more information, visit the official Adno documentation.

errors.unable_reading_file: Unable to read this type of file !
errors.unable_access_file: Unable to reach this file ! Please try again or select another file
errors.manifest_picture_not_found: The manifest or the picture you have entered has not been found
errors.wrong_url: The URL you have entered is not valid
errors.no_title: Please, add a name to your project
errors.unable_reading_manifest: Unable to read this manifest, please try again or choose another one
errors.no_iiif: Non-IIIF project detected, please fill in an IIIF project
errors.wrong_file: This file is not readable by Adno! Please try again with another file

translation.tags_infos: Please press your key 'enter' between each tag to save them

link.url: Add the URL to the IIIF ressources
